extDescription.message: Kamify is a Google Chrome, Chromium or Opera extension that can be used to perform queries towards an OpenKM server.

extAboutText.message: We are a team of Open Sources analysts focused on making life easier for other intelligence analysts. The brand we use is i3visio. If you are curious, you can find more info about us and other projects in which we are involved here:
extAboutText.description: The HTML code to be shown in the about page (without the social links).

footerLicensed.description: The HTML code to be shown in the license disclaimer in the footer.

footerCode.description: The text to be shown when linking to the code in the footer.

footerIssues.description: The text to be shown when linking to the issues Github page in the footer.

badgeTitle.description: The name of the extension as it will be shown in the badge appearing in the toolbar.

texSearch.description: Text that would be placed by default in the textfield for the search.

butSearch.description: Text to be shown in the search button.

aleConfigurationSaved.description: Text to be shown when the new configuration is being saved.

msgNotFoundValidConfig.message: Check the configuration. Some of the compulsory elements (URL, user or password) has not been provided.
msgNotFoundValidConfig.description: Text of the warning message to show when some configuration has not been provided.

tabSearch.description: Text to be shown in the Search tab.

tabProfiles.description: Text to be shown in the Profiles tab.

fileCoding.description: The localised path of the file where the instructions for coders are given.

fileTranslating.description: The localised path of the file where the instructions for translators are given.

fileUsing.description: The localised path of the file where the instructions for end users are given.

fileFAQ.description: The localised path of the file where the frequent questions will be stored.

nameCoding.description: The localised name of the file where the instructions for coders are given.

nameTranslating.description: The localised name of the file where the instructions for translators are given.

nameUsing.description: The localised name of the file where the instructions for end users are given.

nameFAQ.description: The localised name of the file where the frequent questions will be stored.
